subject: Re: Another weird device
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi LC,

Oops... I loaded the wrong set of pictures.  It wasn't in the final 
state of weird yet.  Now I've updated the pics to reflect what goes 
on those prongs.  I guess maybe those are vocal cords for the dead???

http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=200

I've got to stop eating pickels, peppers, and ice cream before bed!

- Mike.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Interesting, Mike.  
> 
> I am wondering how it will work...nothing seems to make sense to me 
> with any of this, but somehow we are getting responses. LOL  
> 
> Yesterday, I thought of your little Listen Up! audio amplifier with 
the 
> Y adapter, headphones and the recorder as an EVP recorder set-up 
for 
> real time audio EVP on investigations.  My plan is to suit-up one 
of my 
> EVP specialists and test in the field within the next couple 
weeks.  
> Perhaps, they might be able to hear the replies as it is being 
> recorded, so they can then ask questions.  Interestingly enough, I 
just 
> received an EVP over top of my ghost box sweeping audio on Friday.  
> Weird. However, I did not envision the chamber with "prongs"(?) 
like 
> you built, though.  
> 
> LOL  Can't wait to hear about your results.
> 
> LC
> http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
> <michaelcoletta@> wrote:
> >
> > You know me and my weird devices... yes I've built another.
> > This one came to me in a dream last night.  I think it was 
because 
> some 
> > of you guys were talking about echo chambers.
> > Anyway... when I woke up I went looking around the house for 
stuff to 
> > make this thing before I forgot what it looked like in my dream.
> > I completed it but now I guess I must test it to see if it is 
what I 
> > think it is... an EVP Box, maybe???
> > 
> > Read more and see a few pictures, here: http://www.ufogeek.com/?
p=200
> > 
> > - Mike
